job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Position:&nbsp;Mid to senior level software engineer&nbsp;Who We AreMLJ Environmental is a small consulting firm located in Davis, California that develops customized software solutions for its clients.&nbsp;We have over 25 years of experience protecting the prosperity of communities and their natural resources.&nbsp;We simplify regulatory compliance with innovative approaches to science and data. MLJ Environmental is seeking a mid to senior level software developer to join our team.&nbsp;Our staff are bright, innovative individuals who are interested in taking on new challenges within their careers. The successful candidate should be comfortable in all aspects of software development. &nbsp;This person should be comfortable working both independently and in a small group.&nbsp;We are seeking an individual willing to learn, be flexible and creative. We are a dog friendly office.&nbsp;Schedule and SalaryThis is an exempt, full time position with 40 hours a week.&nbsp;The salary will be based on experience and competitive within the industry and local market.&nbsp;Full time employment benefits include health, vision, dental and life insurance. Other benefits include vacation, paid holidays, sick leave, and a 401K plan.&nbsp;Example of DutiesEssential functions may include but are not limited to the following:  - Develop Microsoft ASP.NET MVC web applications using C#   
  - Use Visual studio for application development.   
  - Determine solutions to technical hurdles that may arise during the design, testing and maintenance process.   
  - Collaborate with testing team, design team, and implementation team using various diagrams, flow charts and models to assist with internal communication.   
  - Identify and address performance concerns including fixing bugs and/or addressing client concerns.   
  - Ensure that projects meet client deadlines.   
  - Document aspects of the system/project for future upgrades and maintenance.   
  - Other duties as assigned.   
&nbsp;Qualifications  - Completed a bachelor’s degree in Computer Science/Computer Engineering/CIS/MIS or a related field.   
  - Minimum of 3 years of experience within software development.    
Skills  - Well versed in HTML5, CSS, SASS, Javascript, JSON and Jquery.   
  - Some knowledge of relational databases (SQL, MySQL, MSSQL).   
  - Exposure to cloud technologies (Amazon Web Services/AWS).    
  - Attention to detail and organization to be able towork on various parts of a system or application while being accurate and thorough.   
  - The ability to adapt and work on multiple different projects in the same day.    
  - The ability to work in a collaborative environment and communicate. Examples include team white board sessions, storyboarding design concepts, and fleshing out pros and cons of various design options.    
To apply please send a 1) cover letter, 2) resume, and 3) contact information for three references, to Trisha Turner at tturner@mljenvironmental.com. Please include in the subject line: Software Engineer Application and reference in the email where you heard about this position in the email.&nbsp;Applications missing any of the above may not be considered for this position. &nbsp;&nbsp;No phone calls please.&nbsp;Additional information regarding MLJ can be found on our website at www.mljenvironmental.com.
